title: Order new missions issue
body:
I passed first missions last night before 0:00 but after 0:00 and 1:00 there no new missions was appeared. So now on my clock 12:13 (11:13 CEST) but still no new missions... Or missions will appear again 2-3 hours before 0:00 and u would have 0nly 2-3 hours to complete them? Or wtf this sistem idu. I read event page but that didnt explane why there still no new missions...
P.s. sorry for my eng xdd

replies.body: Mission expiration won't be the same as the refresh.  You should start seeing new missions around 11:00am Pacific.  Hope that helps.  :D

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=grb1RPA6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-16T17:22:20.634+0000)
>
> Mission expiration won't be the same as the refresh.  You should start seeing new missions around 11:00am Pacific.  Hope that helps.  :D

So i completed all missions yesterday and today i logedd in to play more and do the dayly missions but the only ones that i have are the awakened and one blade, purpose but they say that they expired, and i have no new missions!
If you logged in before 11am PT, you might have still been seeing the missions from yesterday.  Restarting should update you to today's missions.  Let me know if that helps!

Hey Riot, 

All my missions are the same everyday. I have to win one game with an icon equipped, and then sometimes I'll get a new mission. Is this normal? Or should there be different missions everyday?

Thanks Rito~~

um i already completed all 7 missions  and got the will emblem , are there any more missions after this? or all your giving us is 70 tokens and gonna force us to buy the rest? cuz honestly you guys dont need the extra charge especialy because it has drawn more players and has made the league community actualy cooperate and be a better place to play .
